EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Marina Kostanian (1339179228.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Marina Kostanian (1339179228.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Consultant Services Email - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Marina, Of course, thanks so much for following up. We will remove you form the list. Take care,Sara From: Marina Kostanian [mailto:marina.kostanian@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, June 08, 2012 12:43 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Marina Kostanian Hi Sara,I think there was some misunderstanding. Jim Reid who referred me was informed that you can place people rather than process their paperwork. Though it was nice talking to you, our goals and expectations seem to be different. I am thankful to you for the provided links but I truly do not know how to use the information. Would you please take me off your distribution list? Thank you and best regardsMarina
Sent from my iPad On Jun 8, 2012, at 11:39 AM, "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello Marina, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going? Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: - There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one:
http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgxMDMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1tYXJpbmEua29zdGFuaWFuQGdtYWlsLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMTE3OTctOTQ3ODMmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2BslWrHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> - MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, theres real hard facts about The State of Independence in America <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgxMDMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1tYXJpbmEua29zdGFuaWFuQGdtYWlsLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMTE3OTctOTQ3ODMmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2BslWrHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent.
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgxMDMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1tYXJpbmEua29zdGFuaWFuQGdtYWlsLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMTE3OTctOTQ3ODMmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2BslWrHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X></html
